Engineer the Future.  Thank you for thinking of UIC engineering students! We look forward to working with you.  As your partner in maximizing engineering recruitment and branding opportunities, we are your resource to help make your company a top choice for UIC College of Engineering students. Our staff consists of professionals with various backgrounds in business, higher education and recruitment. We want to make it easy for you to have access to UIC's population of more than 5,000 engineering students.  As a result of the COVID-19 pandemic: we are pivoting many of our traditional on-campus activities and events to virtual formats. We expect to conduct most recruitment events and on-campus interviews virtually for the Fall 2020 semester. We will be updating this website frequently as the state of Illinois releases social distancing policies and guidelines.  Fall 2019 Engineering Majors & Enrollment  Check out the engagement opportunities below and contact us anytime for help arranging your recruitment event.        Engagement           Career Fairs  Register for the Engineering & Computer Science Career Fair             Post a Position  Post your openings, create resume books and review student profiles.  Watch our quick videos to get started             Pop-Ups  Promote your organization for a few hours in a high traffic area on campus, targeting your preferred majors             On-Campus Interviews  We can provide you space to interview students and alumni throughout the year             Company Tours  Host a group of UIC engineering students for a company tour to give them a feel 
of your work environment             Info Sessions  Provide an overview of your company to targeted engineering majors and student organizations             Presentations  Help students prepare for their careers by sharing advice in a workshop setting while promoting your company too             Alumni Mentoring  If you are a UIC engineering alum, you can give back by passing on any industry knowledge and advice             Meet with Us  Help us understand your hiring needs by meeting with us. We can meet on our turf or yours           Employer Testimonial        “We had such a positive experience working with your Engineering Career Center. You were able to assist us in spreading the word about an entry level opportunity we had for a Mechanical Engineer to your graduates and we immediately had highly qualified candidates contact us who had the right credentials our client needed. We were able to successfully place one graduate within only a couple of weeks and hope to place the other candidates soon. We can’t thank you enough for your efforts and hope this is just the beginning of a mutually beneficial partnership!”    Wendy Whelton Pindar | Technical Recruiter - Sterling Engineering             Employers           Engagement Opportunities    Post Positions on UICcareers.com    2018 Employment Outcomes    Career Fairs    Professional Connections Program-Alumni Mentoring    Senior Design Expo    Hiring International Students
